Html:
I saw the Haste Potion as an optional buff, so why not the insane strength potion?
It's a 120 strength for 15 seconds potion.
While the haste potion was 400 haste rating for 15 sec.

I can see about adding it in... However, it would only be useful as a comparison to see just how much worse than Haste Potion it is. Haste Potion always is better than Insane Strength Potion, by quite alot.
